statements: DELETE FROM weather_conditions WHERE location_id = 100 AND temperature < 10.0;
DELETE FROM weather_conditions WHERE location_name = 'New York' AND wind_speed > 20.0;
DELETE FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity > 80
DELETE FROM weather_reports WHERE humidity > 80 AND wind_speed < 10;
DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE temperature > 25);
DELETE FROM skiing_resorts WHERE snow_depth < 50 AND temperature > -10;
